TEXT.TITLE: NOVELL <NOVL> SETS TWO FOR ONE STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Novell Inc said its board declared a two-for-one stock split, payable to holders of record at the close of business on MArch 31. It said shareholders at the annual meeting approved a doubling of authorized common shares to 30 mln from 15 mln and a limitation of directors' liability. Reuter
